@jeremycamp @RileyClemmons @jordanstcyr God used you to recharge my faith in Melbourne.  Your words inspired & lifted me out of the hole I was sinking into. I was blessed in various ways:  volunteers at the church enabled my early entrance due to my disability.Then when you began to sing, it was incredible to my soul!

@PolarVan @OurNewHomecoach My partner has a fully paid off house in a regional town which he leases to a pensioner couple with a disabled adult son and we rent in Melbourne.  So we see it from both sides.
I'd love a dishwasher.

@JEChalmers @PatsKarvelas @RNBreakfast Absolutely I had 3 little kids & worked 2 jobs to keep my home that I paid $48000 for in Sydney!My wife couldn’t work due to the kids 1 was disabled (no childcare or maternity leave then).She worked weekends while I minded the kids. I was a teacher & worked 4 nights at the club.

@CleftpalsV @instanterudite Hard to find specialists and qualified psychologists for disabled white kids (Autism, ADHD, Dyspraxia, Dysgraphia, etc) in Sydney. There must be truckloads of undiagnosed kids in the country. I’ve had to educate both schools my kids go to about disabilities. Majority have no clue

Sydney, and disabled but his feet, but had found.

Hospitals only note a person’s intellectual disability 20% of time – so they don’t adjust their care: Adrian Raymond Walker, who currently works in the Department of Developmental Disability Neuropsychiatry at The University of New South Wales, Sydney https://t.co/0FMApbtIaC

@davebrownradio  Hey Dave, how are you? I am CEO of a disability led filmmaking organisation @BusStopFilms from Sydney, Australia and I am heading to Ottowa and Toronto. I'd love to chat with you. Can you please DM me? Thank you.

@Hellie1982 @joobles_jozen @SOS149 The problem I have is she can't even get the name of the disability correct. It's all just a con with her. If she was so bad yesterday then drove to Sydney today but doesn't need a wheelchair, I'm sorry but I just can't seem to believe a word she says

And I was in Sydney for the day when Julia announced not just support for the #Unions #EqualPay submission to #FairWork, her Govt would #fund the wage increases for Social, Community & Disability Support Workers. Best day ever!! It can be done & #Albo can do this for #AgedCare.

@Apple Rather than reprimanding the two staff involved in your Sydney store, you could ask them to develop new global policies for how Apple will treat disabled customers. This is not an isolated incident for me or for other customers in Apple George St.
Tomorrow’s the day. I’ll be playing Physical Disability Rugby League for the mighty South Sydney Rabbitohs. Cabramatta Rugby League Club. 10.30am kick off. Can’t wait! @SSFCRABBITOHS
@Apple Your service standards to disabled people at your Sydney store should be a source of shame for a multinational company.

@bazzaf65 @loustepsfinance A married couple with two white collar professional incomes living in Sydney metro with 2 young children will be wildly different than a married couple on government welfare disability payments with 2 teenager children living in Logan.

I am not sure I could do an average calc.

#DisabilityTwitter I'm hoping to find a fellow disabled/chronically ill housemate. I'm in SW Brisbane, Aus. I'd prefer female identifying or non binary identifying (CPTSD reasons) & hoping they might be a cat loving introvert LGBTQIA+ fam like me. Any advice how to get word out?

@a_h_reaume I see discrimination, Like the Museum will travel to Winton to look at some Graziers find but won't come to Mt Morgan to check out some disabled person stuff, I got email telling me I still need to travel to Brisbane & stay there while it is done, I can't travel or stay anywhere.

Only the gays
Only the elderly
Only the disabled 

Lived this before. 90s Brisbane in the LGBTQI community. Papers, TV, people on the street. 

‘Thank god it’s the gays, they are not like us + we’re not sad if there are less of them’. 

Didn’t think it would be Grandma next! https://t.co/v3H9locxHx

Oh, and I went to Brisbane's Disability Expo today, where I was apparently abled-passing enough to do undercover dirt-gathering on unethical provider practices.  Sorry, folks, but if you're called "behaviour change" I do reserve my rights to be judgemental about your pamplets.

@RGratton The NDIS is a national disgrace & sham. In Adelaide they hire meth heads as support workers for the disabled. I heard about one client who said the worker drove them intoxicated to do their grocery shopping.

I live in Adelaide I need and want a small dog. Here's a shock though I don't want to get ripped off Who in Adelaide who has dogs or knows someone with breeding dogs happy to sell to Grumpy old leftie on NDIS & DSP just want the runt or the ugly one no one else wants like me HELP
